alert.note: Alert for Eaton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 9:25PM EDT until March 31 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR EATON COUNTY... At 925 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Potterville, or 7 miles northeast of Charlotte, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Charlotte... Eaton Rapids... Grand Ledge... Potterville... Brookfield... Dimondale... Mulliken... Waverly... Gresham... Fitch H Beach Airpor... Skyview Estates Airp... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
